title: Decentralized exchange
text:
On MarsSwap, you will be able to buy and sell equity, foreign currency, and commodities 24/7. Yes, even on weekends!
 A key advantage of a decentralized platform is that no entity can halt trading, close, or limit your positions. For example, the MarsSwap protocol would have allowed you to trade GME even when it was restricted in most retail brokers.
